landing.title: Fumana Iqela Elisondeleyo Kuwe
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo ngezinto ozinikela ingqalelo kwezopolitiko uze ufumane ukuba liphi iqela laseMzantsi Afrika elihambelana neengcinga zakho.
landing.privacy: Iimpendulo zakho zigcinwa kwisixhobo sakho kuphela kwaye azithunyelwa ndawo.

howItHelps.title: Indlela Eli sixhobo Likunceda Ngayo
howItHelps.intro: Cace ukuba ngubani ukuze uvote ngenhloso. Sipakamisa amaqela amangqondo akho ngokucacileyo.

benefit1.title: Susa ingxolo yezithembiso
benefit1.text: Umanele izithembiso zenkampani; jonga ngokuthe ngqo ixabiso lesikhundla samaqela ngumba nangumba.

benefit2.title: Fumana amaqela ongaze uwacinge
benefit2.text: Fumana amaqela ongazange uwajonge nangaphambili ngokubheka imigaqo-nkqubo yabo eyaneleyo, hayi udumo okanye icebo.

benefit3.title: Bona Zonke Izinketho Zakho
benefit3.text: Thola uhlu oluhlelwe lwamaqela ali-11 alinganiswe ngeenqaku, ugxile kwezinketho zakho eziphambili nezinye ezikhethekayo.

benefit4.title: Vota Ngengenelelo
benefit4.text: Yenza isigqibo enolwazi esisekelwe kwidatha. Siqulathe ixabiso lakho nezikhundla zangempela zamaqela ukuze ubone owona ukufana.

about.title: Ngathi: Elekti
about.methodologyText: I-Elekti isebenzisa indlela ebanzi necacileyo yokuthelekisa iindlela zakho nezopolitiko namaqela aseMzantsi Afrika. Sisixhobo esingenacalucalulo nesisebenza ngokungafihlisiyo.
about.howItWorksText: Uphendula imibuzo engama-42 ejolise kwimpilo, uqoqosho, ulawulo, imfundo kunye nemicimbi yoluntu. Imibuzo yenziwe ukuze iveze izimvo zakho ngaphandle kokukhokela kwicala elithile.
about.scoringText: Iimpendulo zakho zithelekiswa neembono zamaqela ezisematheni. Amaqela afumana amanqaku axhomekeke ekubeni ahambelana kangakanani nezimvo zakho. Amanqaku alinganiswa kwinqanaba lika 0â€“100 ukukunika umfanekiso ocacileyo wokuba liphi iqela elikufanela.
about.transparencyText: Wonke umthombo esiwusebenzisayo uvela kwii-manifesto zamaqela, amaxwebhu asemthethweni kunye neengxelo ezithembekileyo. Asizukuxhasa naliphi iqela. Injongo yethu kukukunceda ube nolwazi oluqinileyo.
about.dataSourcesText: Sisebenzisa amaxwebhu asemthethweni, iirekhodi zePalamente kunye nezibhengezo ezithembekileyo. Siyahlaziya rhoqo xa kutshintsha imigaqo-nkqubo.
about.privacyText: Siyibona imfihlo yakho njengento ebaluleke kakhulu. Iimpendulo zakho zihlala kwisixhobo sakho kuphela.
about.noTrackingText: Asisebenzisi ii-cookies okanye naluphi na uhlobo lokulandela. Asikwazi ukubona iimpendulo zakho.
about.localOnlyText: Yonke into yenzeka kwibhrawuza yakho. Xa ucima idatha yebhrawuza yakho, iziphumo ziyanyamalala kuba asizigcinanga.
about.sharingText: Xa wabelana, idatha yakho ifakwa kwi-URL kuphela. Asiyifumani, kwaye wena unolawulo ngokupheleleyo.
about.analyticsText: Sisebenzisa uhlalutyo lweCloudflare olungasebenzisi ii-cookies kwaye olungakukhangeli. Lusinika inani lokusetyenziswa kuphela, hayi idatha yakho yobuqu.
about.partiesText: Sibandakanya amaqela angama-11 ahlukeneyo ukuze kumelwe yonke imigca yezopolitiko eMzantsi Afrika.
about.disclaimerText: I-Elekti sisixhobo semfundo. Kufuneka usafunda ii-manifesto zamaqela kwaye uqhube uphando lwakho. Amaqela ayatshintsha, ngoko iziphumo zethu mazithathwe njengesikhokelo, hayi isigqibo sokugqibela.
about.viewDataText: Ungajonga iifayile zedatha ukuze ubone indlela amanqaku abaliwe ngayo.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress ligqiza likarhulumente elijolise kutshintsho lwezentlalo kunye nokulwa ukungalingani ngokusebenzisa urhulumente.

da.desc: I-Democratic Alliance ikhokela imigaqo yenkululeko, uqoqosho oluxhasayo iyimarike kunye nolawulo olungacimiyo.

mk.desc: Iqela uMkhonto weSizwe lijolise kutshintsho olunzulu noqoqosho oluqhutywa ngurhulumente.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters ligqiza lasekhohlo elijolise kuqoqosho oluphantsi kokonakala, ukwenziwa kwesizwe kunye nokubuyiswa komhlaba ngaphandle kwentlawulo.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party ingundoqo imela uluntu lwamaZulu, igxininisa amaxabiso esiZulu, ulawulo olwahlukeneyo kunye noqoqosho lwemarike olunesazela. Nangona inomdla obanzi, imigaqo-nkqubo igxile kwizithethe zamaZulu nakwiimfuno zaseKwaZulu-Natal.

pa.desc: I-Patriotic Alliance ijolise kwimicimbi yokufudukela nokukhusela iimfuno zabemi baseMzantsi Afrika.

vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus ingundoqo imela uluntu lwama-Afrikaner kunye neeminqweno zawo, ixhasa ulawulo olwahlukeneyo, amalungelo oluntu kunye namaxabiso olondolozo. Imigaqo-nkqubo igxile ekugcinweni kwenkcubeko yama-Afrikaner nasekuzilawuleni.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA lijolise kulawulo olusebenzayo, ukulwa ukurhwaphilizo kunye nophuhliso noqoqosho.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party ixhasa amaxabiso obuKristu kunye neenkqubo zoluntu ezilondolozayo.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change ijolise kuluntu, iphakamisa imigaqo-nkqubo ehlangabezana neemfuno zabahlali.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party ixhasa ubusoshiyali kunye namalungelo abasebenzi.

q1.text: Urhulumente kufuneka anyuse irhafu kubo bakwizinga eliphezulu ukuze axhase iinkqubo zentlalo.

q2.text: Ukunciphisa ityala likarhulumente kufuneka kuqwalaselwe nangona kunciphisa inkxaso yesocial.

q3.text: Urhulumente kufanele axhase amashishini amancinci naphakathi ukuze akhule.

q5.text: Imisebenzi yoluntu enabasebenzi abaninzi yindlela efanelekileyo yokunciphisa ukungasebenzi.

q6.text: Impilo kufuneka ihlawulelwe ngurhulumente ukuze wonke umntu afumane inkonzo.

q7.text: Imfundo ephakamileyo kufuneka ibe simahla kubo bonke abafundi.

q8.text: Urhulumente kufuneka axhase iintsapho ngenkxaso-mali yokunyamekela abantwana.

q9.text: Urhulumente wasekuhlaleni kufuneka ulawulwe ngobuchule kwaye uhlolwe rhoqo.

q10.text: Iinkonzo ezifana nombane namanzi kufuneka zihlale zikwirhulumente.

q11.text: Umthetho kufuneka uvumele ukubuyiswa komhlaba ngaphandle kwentlawulo epheleleyo.

q12.text: Amasimi amancinci noluntu kufuneka axhaswe ngakumbi.

q13.text: Abasebenzi kufuneka banikwe amandla ngakumbi okuseka iinyunyana nokugwayimba.

q14.text: Umvuzo omncinci kufuneka unyuswe ukuze kuncitshiswe intlupheko yomsebenzi.

q16.text: Amapolisa kufuneka afumane amandla ngakumbi okulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho.

q17.text: Iijaji kunye neenkundla kufuneka zikhuselwe kuhlaselo kwezopolitiko.

q19.text: Amalungelo oluntu kufuneka akhuseleke ngalo lonke ixesha.

q21.text: Inkxaso kumajelo eendaba azimeleyo kufuneka yomelezwe.

q22.text: UMzantsi Afrika kufuneka unciphise ukukhutshwa kweegesi ezitshabalalisayo.

q24.text: Umthetho wokukhusela indalo kufuneka uzingwe ngaphezu kweminye imisebenzi yezimbiwa.

q25.text: UMzantsi Afrika kufuneka unyuse urhwebo lwamazwe ngamazwe.

q26.text: Kufuneka kuqinisekiswe ubudlelwane obomeleleyo namazwe eGlobal South.

q28.text: Izithuthi zikawonkewonke kufuneka zikhutshwe phambili kunendlela ezingaphezulu.

q30.text: Izixeko kufuneka zibe noluntu oluhambayo, iindawo eziluhlaza kunye nokuxubana kweendawo.

q32.text: Urhulumente kufuneka alawule i-AI ukuze akhusele imisebenzi.

q33.text: Imali yophando kufuneka inyuswe ukuze kuqhutyekwe uphuhliso.

q34.text: Ukutya kufuneka kukhuselwe ngemigaqo-nkqubo exhasa ukuvelisa kwasekhaya.

q35.text: Amaqela okufuywa kwezilwanyana kufuneka alawulwe ngakumbi.

q36.text: Ukwenzeka kwemisebenzi yabantu abancinci kufuna iinkqubo ezikhethekileyo zesizwe.

q37.text: Abantu abaphila nokukhubazeka kufuneka baxhaswe ngendlela engcono kuzo zonke iinkonzo.

q38.text: Kufuneka kubekho inkxaso kwiimarike zasezilalini nasezidolophini.

q39.text: Ulwimi kunye nobugcisa baseMzantsi Afrika kufuneka baxhaswe ngemali karhulumente.

q40.text: Abavoti kufuneka bajonge indlela amaqela aqhube ngayo kunokuba bajonge izithethanthemba.

q41.text: Amaqela ezopolitiko kufuneka enze imigaqo-nkqubo ekhethekileyo ejolise kwimingeni kunye namava embali oluntu lwam.

q42.text: Ndikhethela ukuvotela amaqela agxininisa ekumeleni nasekuphuculeni iqela lam lomntu okanye uluntu.
